panels.description:
This example code serves to demonstrate the possibilities in
retrieving telemetry data from Orchestrator and EdgeConnect and
visuzalize it. The demo is simple to run, however, modifying
and/or incorporating components of this work into your own solution
requires a greater understanding of Python, Docker, InfluxDB,
Grafana, and Redis.


All of these components are not necessarily required for developing
your own solution as there may be pieces of data you don't need
to collect, some additional others that you want to add,
substitude alternative tools for task queuing, database, and
visualization or alerting needs.

options.content: THIS DEMO IS NOT MEANT TO BE A PRODUCTION MONITORING SOLUTION

panels.description:
Appliance state to Orchestrator value mapping


0 - Unknown ( When an appliance is added to Orchestrator, it
          is in this state )


1 - Normal ( Appliance is reachable from Orchestrator)


2 - Unreachable ( Appliance is unreachable from Orchestrator )


3 - Unsupported Version ( Orchestrator does not support this version of the appliance )


4 - Out of Synchronization ( Orchestrator's cache of appliance configuration/state is out of sync with the configuration/state on the appliance )


5 - Synchronization in Progress ( Orchestrator is currently synchronizing appliances's configuration and state )

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_metadata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "appliance_state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description:
Appliance reachability to Orchestrator value mapping


0 â€“ Unknown


1 - Orchestrator talks to appliance using HTTP/HTTPS using user id and password. This is not used for EdgeConnects and SD-WAN


2 - Appliance connects to Orchestrator using HTTPS Websocket. Orchestrator uses this permanent connection to configure/monitor appliance. This is done because Appliance may be behind a firewall making it hard for Orchestrator to contact appliance using IP address


4 - Orchestrator sends configuration/monitoring request to Aruba Cloud Portal which relays those requests to Appliance. Appliance sends its response to Cloud Portal which relays it back to Orchestrator

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "appliance_reachability")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: CPU utilization can normally be high on an appliance. Monitoring Idle dropping overly low is indicative of resource issues. Which cpu # is most critical for functions varies by hardware platform

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_stats")
  // Only show CPU values for those over 95% to limit noise in graph
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_pIdle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu_number"] != "ALL")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_field", "cpu_number"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Disk Utilization

panels.description: Total Flows through an appliance, capacity of flows-per-second vary by platform. Total flows is calculated as transformation adding together created and existing flows.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flows_created")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
//group by time to isolate the values you want to sum togehter
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
//to ungroup your data provide a group without any columns
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value":"Flows Created"})
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flows_exist")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
//group by time to isolate the values you want to sum togehter
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
//to ungroup your data provide a group without any columns
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value":"Flows Exist"})
  |> yield()

panels.title: Total Flows

panels.description: Average PPS calculated from minute data and divided by 60, Realtime PPS is the current PPS at the time of query based on realtime second data

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lan_rx_packets" or r["_field"] == "lan_tx_packets" or r["_field"] == "wan_rx_packets" or r["_field"] == "wan_tx_packets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60}))
//group by time to isolate the values you want to sum togehter
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
//to ungroup your data provide a group without any columns
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "realtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "pps")

panels.title: Packets Per Second

panels.description:
Each number code represents some sort of drops in the system â€“ most of them are normal. Some of them are equivalent to â€œinterface queue dropsâ€ on traditional routers. We are interested in these codes:


8 â€“ LAN Rx Queue Full


18 â€“ LAN Tx Queue Full


19 â€“ LAN Tx ZCI Queue Full


31 â€“ Wan Rx Queue Full


53 â€“ Wan Tx ZCI Queue Full


Demo code currently aggregates all other drops into single code of "Other"
panels.title: Drops

panels.description: Pulls together system-wide deployment configuration and license values alongside real transmit/receive values. Appliances with Unlimited license will not display license value on graph

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_rx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 8}))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Data RX"})
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_tx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 8}))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Data TX"})
  |> yield()

RX = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deployment_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_inbound_bw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface_name"] == "SYSTEM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Configured RX BW"}))
  |> yield(name:"RX")

TX = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deployment_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_outbound_bw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface_name"] == "SYSTEM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Configured TX BW"}))
|> yield(name:"TX")

from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_metadata")
  // exclude showing license for Unlimited as value is irrelevent
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "license_bw" and r._value < 1000000000)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Bandwidth License TX"}))

from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_metadata")
  // exclude showing license for Unlimited as value is irrelevent
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "license_bw" and r._value < 1000000000)

panels.title: 95th Percentile

panels.description: Max percentage utilization of real inbound/outbound compared to configured license and deployment values

targets.query:
lic = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "appliance_metadata")
  // exclude showing license for Unlimited as value is irrelevent
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "license_bw" and r._value < 1000000000)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:1m,fn:last)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)


datarx = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_rx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 8}))
  |> drop(columns: ["flow_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every:1m,fn:last)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

deprx = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deployment_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_inbound_bw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface_name"] == "SYSTEM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:1m,fn:last)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

// Calculate Utilization of DataRX vs Deployment
join(tables:{deprx:deprx, datarx:datarx}, on:["_time"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({
    "RX Deployment": float(v: r._value_datarx) / float(v: r._value_deprx) }))
  |> last(column: "RX Deployment")
  |> yield(name: "inbound dep")

// Calculate Utilization of DataRX vs License
join(tables:{lic:lic, datarx:datarx}, on:["_time"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({
    "RX License": float(v: r._value_datarx) / float(v: r._value_lic) }))
  |> last(column: "RX License")
  |> yield(name: "inbound lic")

datatx = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flow_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_tx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["traffic_type"] == "all_traffic")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 8}))
  |> drop(columns: ["flow_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every:1m,fn:last)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

deptx = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deployment_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wan_outbound_bw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface_name"] == "SYSTEM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:1m,fn:last)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

// Calculate Utilization of DataTX vs Deployment
join(tables:{deptx:deptx, datatx:datatx}, on:["_time"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({
    "TX Deployment": float(v: r._value_datatx) / float(v: r._value_deptx) }))
  |> last(column: "TX Deployment")
  |> yield(name: "outbound")

// Calculate Utilization of DataTX vs License
join(tables:{lic:lic, datatx:datatx}, on:["_time"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({
    "TX License": float(v: r._value_datatx) / float(v: r._value_lic) }))
  |> last(column: "TX License")
  |> yield(name: "outbound lic")

panels.description: Alias names of Third Party tunnels in a down state, click inspect to see full list of tunnel names. If tunnel count is too long there is likely a larger issue at hand on the WAN labels in use to get to the third parties, or the third party experiencing an issue itself

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tunnel_count_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "third_party_down_tunnels")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> yield()

panels.description: Jitter on tunnel over time, moving average to compare against as baseline calculated every minute with a period based on dashboard variable of "Moving Average Period"

targets.query:
current_jitter = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tunnel_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Jitter_(ms)")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tunnel_alias"] == "${tunnel_analysis_peer}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_value":"Actual"})
  |> yield(name: "current")

ma_jitter = from(bucket: "${db_bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${ec_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tunnel_stats")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Jitter_(ms)")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tunnel_alias"] == "${tunnel_analysis_peer}")
  |> timedMovingAverage(every: 1m, period: ${baseline_period})
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_value":"Moving Average"})
  |> yield("name": "moving_average")
